Subject: Need EPP Client  for Amazon Linux 2
Description:
Hello,

We have a Amazon Linux 2 server where i tried install EPP client for centos but getting multiple error during installation. Can you please share epp client which is compatible with Amazon Linux 2
Solution_Comment__c:
Provided new AWS Linux 2 client. Confirmed to work.
Download link:
https://download.endpointprotector.com/linux_agent/EPPClient_v2.4.1.2001/EPPClient_amzn_2_v2.4.1.2001_x86_64.tar.gz
